Class BooleanAssertion

  • Object
    • BooleanAssertion

  • public class BooleanAssertion
extends Object
    Represents an assertion about a boolean variable.
    Author:
    ejewart

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BooleanAssertion(boolean subject, String... subjectDescArg) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BooleanAssertion isFalse(String... reasonArg)
      Verifies that the boolean variable is false, and causes the test to fail if not.
      BooleanAssertion isTrue(String... reasonArg)
      Verifies that the boolean value is true, and fails the test if not.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BooleanAssertion

        BooleanAssertion(boolean subject,
                 String... subjectDescArg)

    • Method Detail

      • isTrue

        public BooleanAssertion isTrue(String... reasonArg)
        Verifies that the boolean value is true, and fails the test if not.
        Parameters:
        reasonArg - optional text that if present is included in the failure message saying why the value was expected to be true.
        Returns:
        this if the value is true - probably not useful since the only methods are isTrue and isFalse and one has already been called
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if the value is not true

      • isFalse

        public BooleanAssertion isFalse(String... reasonArg)
        Verifies that the boolean variable is false, and causes the test to fail if not.
        Parameters:
        reasonArg - optional text that if present is included in the failure message saying why the value was expected to be true.
        Returns:
        this if the value is false - probably not useful since the only methods are isTrue and isFalse and one has already been called
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if the value is true
